update.name: Chamilo-LMS-Unauthenticated-File-Upload-CVE-2023-4220
update.description: Unrestricted file upload in big file upload functionality in `/main/inc/lib/javascript/bigupload/inc/bigUpload.php` in Chamilo LMS <= v1.11.24 allows unauthenticated attackers to perform stored cross-site scripting attacks and obtain remote code execution via uploading of web shell.

update.name: CVE-2024-6387-Check
update.description: CVE-2024-6387 Checker is a fast, efficient tool for detecting OpenSSH servers vulnerable to the regreSSHion exploit. It quickly scans multiple IPs, domain names, and CIDR ranges to identify risks and help secure your infrastructure.

update.name: CVE-2024-39943-Poc
update.description: CVE-2024-39943 rejetto HFS (aka HTTP File Server) 3 before 0.52.10 on Linux, UNIX, and macOS allows OS command execution by remote authenticated users (if they have Upload permissions). This occurs because a shell is used to execute df (i.e., with execSync instead of spawnSync in child_process in Node.js).

update.name: Chamilo-LMS-CVE-2023-4220-Exploit
update.description: This is an Exploit for Unrestricted file upload in big file upload functionality in Chamilo-LMS for this location "/main/inc/lib/javascript/bigupload/inc/bigUpload.php" in Chamilo LMS <= v1.11.24, and Attackers can obtain remote code execution via uploading of web shell.

update.name: cve-2024-6387_hassh
update.description: HASSH fingerprints for identifying OpenSSH servers potentially vulnerable to CVE-2024-6387 (regreSSHion).

update.name: CVE-2024-39943-Poc
update.description: CVE-2024-39943 rejetto HFS (aka HTTP File Server) 3 before 0.52.10 on Linux, UNIX, and macOS allows OS command execution by remote authenticated users (if they have Upload permissions). This occurs because a shell is used to execute df (i.e., with execSync instead of spawnSync in child_process in Node.js).
